name: House Cleaning
title: House Cleaning Services
description: Professional house cleaning services including dusting, vacuuming, mopping, kitchen and bathroom cleaning.
benefits: Thorough cleaning of all living areas
ideal_for: Homeowners looking for regular maintenance cleaning or one-time deep cleaning of their entire home.

name: Deep Cleaning
title: Deep Cleaning Services
description: Comprehensive deep cleaning that reaches areas often missed, including baseboards, ceiling fans, inside appliances, and behind furniture.
ideal_for: Homes that need extra attention, spring cleaning, post-renovation cleanup, or preparing for special events.

name: Move-Out Cleaning
title: Move-Out Cleaning Services
description: Comprehensive cleaning services for when you're moving out, ensuring you leave the property spotless to secure your security deposit.
ideal_for: Renters and homeowners moving out who want to leave the property in pristine condition.

name: Recurring Cleaning
title: Recurring Cleaning Services
description: Regular maintenance cleaning on a weekly, biweekly, or monthly schedule to keep your home consistently clean.
ideal_for: Busy families and professionals who want to maintain a consistently clean home without the hassle.

name: Recurring Maid Service
title: Recurring Maid Service
description: Professional maid service on a regular schedule, providing consistent cleaning by the same dedicated team.
ideal_for: Homeowners and busy professionals who want reliable, recurring maid service to maintain a clean home.

name: Commercial Cleaning
title: Commercial Cleaning Services
description: Professional office and commercial space cleaning services with flexible scheduling and commercial-grade standards.
ideal_for: Businesses, offices, retail spaces, and commercial properties that need professional cleaning services.

name: Office Cleaning
title: Office Cleaning Services
description: Professional office cleaning services designed to maintain a clean, productive work environment for your business.
ideal_for: Office buildings, corporate spaces, and professional environments that need regular cleaning services.

name: Apartment Cleaning
title: Apartment Cleaning Services
description: Specialized cleaning services for apartments, condos, and smaller living spaces with efficient and thorough cleaning.
ideal_for: Apartment and condo residents looking for professional cleaning services tailored to smaller living spaces.

name: Airbnb / Short-Term Rental Turnover
title: Airbnb & Short-Term Rental Cleaning
description: Fast, thorough turnover cleaning for Airbnb, VRBO, and short-term rentals to ensure 5-star guest experiences.
ideal_for: Airbnb hosts, vacation rental owners, and property managers who need reliable turnover cleaning.

name: Post-Construction Cleaning
title: Post-Construction Cleaning Services
description: Detailed cleaning after construction or renovation projects, removing dust, debris, and residue.
benefits: Removal of construction dust and debris
ideal_for: Contractors, builders, and homeowners who need thorough cleaning after construction or renovation work.

name: Same-Day Cleaning
title: Same-Day Cleaning Services
description: Emergency and same-day cleaning services for urgent cleaning needs, available with short notice.
ideal_for: Anyone with urgent cleaning needs, unexpected guests, or last-minute events requiring immediate cleaning.
